title: Got demoted on a win
body: My internet went out mid match for like 5 minutes i came back won the game, and got demoted because the game registered me as afk.

replies.body: Not a bug. You don't get match credit when you AFK, even if you come back.
i wasnt afk it was an uncontrollable circumstance of my internet going out.

> [{quoted}](name=ShadowBF,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=R3LIrZvg,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-08-03T03:01:45.674+0000)
>
> i wasnt afk it was an uncontrollable circumstance of my internet going out.

The game doesn't know why you disconnected. It just knows you weren't participating in the match. That's what's meant by "AFK" in this context, not necessarily that you literally walked away from the keyboard.
well then who would i contact about me getting deranked for it because its really frustrating to derank over something so silly.

> [{quoted}](name=ShadowBF,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=R3LIrZvg,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-03T03:33:57.337+0000)
>
> well then who would i contact about me getting deranked for it because its really frustrating to derank over something so silly.

You can contact anyone you like but it won't get you your LP back because that mechanic is working as Riot intends it to.
